SENT.plain: To date, very few cases of aneurisms or vascular grafts infections have been described
We report the rare case of an extradigestive manifestation, due to Salmonella enteritidis affecting a patient with BehÃ§et disease
The biological diagnosis is based on microorganism isolation from the site of infection but also from blood cultures
The initial treatment combined antibiotherapy and surgical procedure and replacement of the arteriovenous graft
